description: I think it's using outdated library versions or something because Drawpile does these weird things where it doesn't detect my eraser while both GIMP and Krita do without issue.

I like this app because the collaborative drawing part and the brushes. There is not so much brushes but the default ones are my go to brushes.
I tried krita, gimp and an obsolete painting program named rgb paint, and still i like this app.
summary: Nice app for drawing with friends over the internet

description: El hecho que sea colaborativa, la hace muy útil para quienes enseñan dibujo o arte digital a grupos de personas. Y como si esto fuera poco es Software Libre. Está dotada de múltiples recursos.  Ojalá pronto esté disponible en español.
